summary: Extended /review command with bidirectional ROADMAP.md integration. Added Section 1.6 for loading Strategies/Ambitions context, Section 6.5 for roadmap revision (strategy updates, ambition proposals, gap notes), Section 8.5 for task suggestions. Updated report template, git commit format, and output to include roadmap revision information.

artifacts.summary: Extended with sections 1.6 (roadmap context loading), 6.5 (roadmap revision), 8.5 (task suggestions), and updated report template
Implementation summary with verification results and detailed change list

completion_data.completion_summary: Extended /review command with bidirectional ROADMAP.md integration: Section 1.6 loads Strategies/Ambitions for review focus, Section 6.5 revises roadmap based on findings (strategy status updates, new ambition proposals with user approval, gap notes to Open Questions), Section 8.5 provides prioritized task suggestions following /todo and /learn patterns.
completion_data.claudemd_suggestions: Extended .claude/commands/review.md with 4 new sections (1.6, 6.5, 8.5, extended Section 4), ~400 lines added for roadmap context loading, revision logic, and task suggestions output

next_steps: Run /review to test the new roadmap integration (note: Strategies/Ambitions sections are placeholder until Task 833 populates them)
